entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
